alert.note: Alert for Owyhee Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 11 at 2:17PM MDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Owyhee County through 245 PM MDT... At 217 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Hackberry Reservoir, or 48 miles east of Rome, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Indian Meadows around 230 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
